journal.found-machine: You feel a bit dehydrated. Maybe you can get a drink from the vending machine.
journal.need-yen: You need to get some yen to feed the machine. Wandering around might give you ideas.
journal.complete: Meiji Chocolate is the most delicious thing in the world.

journal.found-shop: Maybe Ramen-ya will satiate your hunger.
journal.learn-colors: The red menu item looks pretty attractive. Maybe you can wander around and figure out how to say red.
journal.complete: You can't decide if Meiji chocolate or ramen is better.
